name: The Dust on My Desk
description:
Mouse  and W A S D for controls. 

The dust on my desk looked like an epic movie. So I spent far too long taking a picture of it. My wife made fun of me for that so rather than back down I dug my heels in and spent even more time making a song about it. Somehow that wasn't enough time wasted by my brain, so now I've also made a game about it. I'm still not sure why. Enjoy, maybe.
